Text: Hey everyone. So I have now changed the block size to 512 KB blocks. Hopefully this makes it a bit easier to download. Enjoy:)
Next torrent will be For The Love of The Game (Kevin Costner)

This is a bit huge for what I was looking for... a complete DVD-rip of a movie I'm only planning to watch once. A 700MB upload would have been preferred, but I'll take what I can get.

Thanks for the upload, and I will definitely seed as much as I can, even though there aren't many leechers.

Ah, my mistake... forget what I said earlier about it being 700MB, I didn't read the title properly.. I thought it said DVD-RIP, but it says DVD-R... makes perfect sense that it's 4.3GB in that case. I'll still seed as much as I can, that hasn't changed.
